title: Wyoming Veterans Property Tax Exemption (Assessed Value Reduction)
summary: Property tax relief for qualifying combat veterans (or surviving spouse) via an assessed value reduction that can be applied to a primary residence or motor vehicle registration (per Wyoming Dept. of Revenue guidance).

requirements.notes: Wyoming residency and time-in-state requirements apply; surviving spouse eligibility continues until remarriage. Exemption value described by DOR.

eligibilityNotes: Apply annually through your County Assessorâ€™s office by the county deadline (often the 4th Monday in May). Exemption can be applied to property tax on primary residence or motor vehicle registration.
